summary: Sets all of your skills to 100 and your character\'s level to 50, giving you a total of 49 perks to play with.
descriptionHtml:
The stone is located in whiterun, next to the sign for the drunken huntsman. Just activate it to make it work. 

Sets all of your skills to 100 and your character\'s level to 50, giving you a total of 49 perks to play with. 

Made for my own use for making a blank character with max skills for testing mods with and also to learn some basic papyrus. Uploaded because I thought I might as well let others use it incase they find it useful. 

Could be used for testing new builds as well as for testing mods. 

Note: Repeated uses of the stone will continue to advance your levels and provide more perks, whilst keeping your skill levels at 100. 

Feedback from users implies that this works fine with DLC. 

I\'ve been told that this doesn\'t work for some people with open city mods. The ones that stop Whiterun being it\'s own world space. Feedback from others who use these mods would be very helpful.

Also available on the workshop:
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=9448
author: Jokiros
